content:
European Research and Innovation Days is the European Commission’s annual flagship event, bringing together policymakers, researchers, entrepreneurs and citizens to debate and shape the future of research and innovation in Europe and beyond.

:time: September 22-24 2020

https://ec.europa.eu/info/research-and-innovation/events/upcoming-events/european-research-and-innovation-days_en

You can also have a look at last year panel regarding Human-centered Artificial Intelligence with speakers Virginia DIGNUM (Umeå, Sweden),
Àngels ORDUNA-CAO (A.SPIRE, Belgium), Barry O'SULLIVAN (University College Cork, Ireland), George TILESCH (IPSOS Global Affairs, France) and Khalil ROUHANA (European Commission, DG CNCT, Belgium), here: https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/events/cf/european-research-and-innovation-days/item-display.cfm?id=23513

European Research and Innovation Days
An online event bringing stakeholders together to shape future EU research and innovation policy
